About me

Proficient Cyber Security with 5 years' experience, providing business with credible cyber security advice and guidance to mitigate cyber security risk and a cemented understanding of cyber security analysis, tools and software, with knowledge of all aspects of cyber security threats including Distributed Denial of Service Attacks, malware, spyware and exploits. proficient in identifying system vulnerabilities and mitigating potential cyber security threats. Comperhensive experience in developing vulnerability assessment plans including disaster recovery procedures for a variety of industries and also skilled at providing reports in an accessible manner.
" one Single Vulnerability is all an attacker needs "

My Skills

Data Security

I have knowledge in doing Data Encryption, Data Erasure, Data Masking and Monitoring data usage patterns for any abnormal activity patterns

Disaster Recovery

I have knowledge in doing data and computer processing When servers go down because of a natural disaster, equipment failure or cyber attack.

Data Science

I have knowledge in doing Data and Quantitative Analysis, Decision Analytics, Predictive Modeling, Algorithms.
